comprehensive_overview: Pandoc is a free and open-source document converter, widely used for converting between various markup and word processing formats.
core_features: Converts between numerous formats such as Markdown, HTML, LaTeX, PDF, DOCX, and more
Supports a wide range of input and output formats
Handles complex document conversions with ease
Highly customizable through various options and extensions
Can be used from the command line or integrated into other tools and workflows
